original_title: The dolls come to life at midnight
overview: The sisters inherit a house that once belonged to a silent film actress. For many years the house has been empty and is considered damned...  At first, Anna does not believe in the terrible past that her relatives warn about. Suddenly strange things began to happen to her. Trying to uncover the secret, Anna finds the diary and tape that belonged to the actress. In the course of reading, she learns the life of an actress, the reasons for the tragedy...  Strange things keep happening, and Anna realizes that mysterious predictions are coming true…
tagline: Death isn't the end of life, but only its reincarnation…
title: The dolls come to life at midnight
